H3.text: where is dancing on ice filmed this year. RAF Bovingdon

A4.text: For the 2018 revival series the show was relocated to a purpose-built studio at RAF Bovingdon.

A5.text: For this series, the show relocated from its previous home at Elstree Studios to a new, purpose-built studio at RAF Bovingdon in Hertfordshire.
